overview: Ben Randolph handles all new agency relationships and directs the emerging marketing technologies team for the Agency Entourage. Ben has worked in many innovative and interdisciplinary environments throughout his career. Tapping emerging trends and utilizing cutting-edge creative and technology, he has helped Agency Entourage build a reputation on developing the most innovative, never-been-done-before interactive campaigns. Ben has been tasked with developing emerging marketing technologies and bringing them to life, utilizing Agency Entourage’s team of creative and technologist.
